title: Citrus Furikake
directions: Toast the sheets of nori for about five minutes. Remove, allow to cool, and crumble into tiny flakes.
Arrange the sesame seeds on a baking sheet. Place in the oven and toast until the white seeds a nicely golden. Remove and allow to cool.
If you haven’t already, remove the little black seeds from each cardamom pod and crush into a fine powder in a mortar and pestle.
Combine the nori, sesame seeds, flax seeds, citrus peel, salt, sugar (if using), and cardamom pods in a bowl. Stir well and store in an airtight container until ready to use.
